alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 7:54PM MST until August 25 at 12:15AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 752 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms along and near Highway 286. The heaviest rainfall has occurred near the junction of Highway 86 and Arivaca Road. Rainfall runoff may impact portions of Highway 286. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Pima County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
